description: This file defines a React functional component for a login page. It manages user login state, handles form submission, displays errors, and navigates upon successful login. It also supports displaying success messages after signup and maintains form state with React hooks.

methods.name: Login
methods.description: React functional component rendering the login page with email/password form, handling validation, submission, and navigation.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Event handler for form submission that performs login logic, handles errors, and navigates on success.

search-terms: Login form with email and password
